info.name: FXChrome App Button - Like Google Chrome
info.description:
Requires Firefox extension Moveable Firefox Button https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/movable-firefox-button/ to move the button to the tool bar. 

fxchrome https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/fxchrome/
info.additionalInfo: Code from Firefox App Button - Like Google Chrome by chrispalmeri http://userstyles.org/styles/58402/firefox-app-button-like-google-chrome

data.title: Works for me in Windows and Linux
